alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 9:27PM CDT until August 26 at 5:22PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Styx River Near Elsanor affecting Baldwin County. For the Styx River...including Elsanor...Minor flooding is forecast. The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Warning for the Styx River Near Elsanor. * From late tonight to Friday afternoon. * At 9:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 9.3 feet. * Flood stage is 12 feet. * Minor flooding is forecast. * Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 13.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. Further rises may occur depending on how much rain falls over the next few days. * Impact...At 14 feet, Moderate Flood Stage. Water approaches houses on Donovan Circle in the Seminole Landing community. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
